channel.title: How do i change max people?
channel.description: How would i change the max people in my server i tryed changeing the maxplayer thing from 25 to 16 but it lags hole server and i got to restart it once it gets to 16

item.title: How do i change max people?
item.dc:creator: @rey123619 rey123619
item.description:
@rey123619 wrote:

Mine looks like this i only wont about 15 people to be on at a time but more than 15 come in

[code]public static int EnergyRegian = 60;

public static int MaxConnections = 15;
public static String[] Connections = new String[MaxConnections];
public static int[] ConnectionCount = new int[MaxConnections];
public static boolean ShutDown = false;
public static int ShutDownCounter = 0;[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2007, 11:30:51 AM[/size][hr]plz help me=(

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change max people?

Sure the number change does something, but getting more RAM is more effective.

item.title: How do i change max people?
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Open server.java, and search for-

MaxConnections =

and the number next to the equal sign ( = ) is what you change. Default is 100.
i.e…-

MaxConnections = MAXPLAYERNUMBER;

Just Change The Thing “MAXPLAYERNUMBER” to what ever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change max people?

server -> public static int MaxConnections = 100;
